definition: to ramble/to rove/old variant of 熬[ao2]

to come first in triennial palace examinations (idiom, refers to the carved stone turtle head in front of the imperial palace, next to which the most successful candidate in the imperial examinations was entitled to stand)/to be the champion/to be the very best in any field
see 博鰲鎮|博鳌镇[Bo2 ao2 zhen4]

pinyin: Bo2 ao2 Ya4 zhou1 Lun4 tan2

definition: to clap and dance with joy
debt as heavy as a mountain on a turtle's back

sentences.english: Augus Partners is an international corporate advisory firm based in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 鳌智是一家位于北京的国际专业企业谘询公司。

sentences.english: This only relate to the pound fish mostly can relate to bring in enough heaven.
sentences.chinese: 这只鳌鱼的磅大都可以用鳌足拿来顶天。

sentences.english: This only relate to the pound fish mostly can relate to bring in enough heaven.
sentences.chinese: 这只鳌鱼的磅大都可以用鳌足拿来顶天。

sentences.english: Their friendship was turned to enmity through idle gossips.
sentences.chinese: 流言鳌语使他们之问的友情变成了怨仇。

sentences.english: God is a Lobster, or a double pincer, a double bind.
sentences.chinese: 上帝是大龙虾，有一对鳌钳或一对夹钳。

sentences.english: In the sea there is a huge legendary turtle.
sentences.chinese: 海里有一条传说中的大鳌鱼。

sentences.english: It pointed a claw-like finger at his chest.
sentences.chinese: 它用鳌一样的手指指着自己的胸膛。

sentences.english: The Guanyin Bodhisattva is fighting against the turtle.
sentences.chinese: 观音菩萨正和鳌鱼搏斗。

definition: a legendary dragon with the ability to control rain and floods/see also 蛟龍|蛟龙[jiao1 long2]
kun 鯤|鲲[kun1] and peng 鵬|鹏[Peng2], mythological beasts/peng, a gigantic bird transformed from the kun
Blue Dragon, other name of the Azure Dragon 青龍|青龙 (the seven mansions of the east sky)
